title: Organize Now!: Think and Live Clutter Free
description: Find Your Focus! You are bombarded with mental clutter every day--countless distraction, endless options, the perpetual to-do list--and it's holding you back. In this book, organizing expert and best-selling author Jennifer Ford Berry shows you how to quickly cut out the clutter so you can create the home you've always wanted. Shed the meaningless distractions to make room for the things that matter the most to you. Inside you'll Learn how to focus your thoughts, choices, and actions to create the life of your dreams.
author: Jennifer Ford Berry
